locations.name: Aster Memorial Park
locations.desc: A public park dedicated to the recently-deceased superhero Aster, built over the crater left by his last fight. There's a well-maintained statue of him in the centre, surrounded by flowers.

locations.name: Linden Reformatory
locations.desc: A theoretically high-security prison dedicated to containing and reforming supervillains, and villains with supervillainous aspirations. Given the number of supervillains who escape, it doesn't seem too effective.
